word_mean: 再发的，复发的：间歇后复又发生的
回归的：返回或朝向原处的

sentence.Network_en: A dentist may decide to extract the tooth to prevent recurrent trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 牙医可能会决定拔掉那颗牙，以免反复发作。

sentence.Network_en: Race is a recurrent theme in the work.
sentence.Network_cn: 种族问题是该作品里多次出现的主题。

sentence.Network_en: Inflation will remain a recurrent plague.
sentence.Network_cn: 通货膨胀将继续成为周期性的烦扰。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... recurrence formula 递推公式 recurrent 循环的 recurring decimal 循环小数.
（2）反复性（recurrent）：多数超敏反应性疾病可反复发作（3）可逆性（reversible）：早期呈可逆性，一次发作后可自行缓解，或 …
recurrent respiratory tract infection , rrti ., 反复呼吸道感染.
unexplained recurrent spontaneous abortion , ursa ., 不明原因复发性流产.

list.abs: 建筑词汇英语翻译(O-T) ... rectilinear building 直线形建筑物 recurrence interval 重现期 recycle 再循环.

会计词汇E ... recurrent cost 经常费用；经常成本 recurrent expenditure 经常开支 recurrent revenue 经常收入.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in sense 2): from Latin recurrent- 'running back', from the verb recurrere (see recur)

entry.def: A recurrent event or feeling happens or is experienced more than once.

example.ex: Race is a recurrent theme in the work.
example.tran: 种族问题是该作品里多次出现的主题。

example.ex: ...buildings in which staff suffer recurrent illness.
example.tran: 里面的员工经常生病的建筑

auth_sentence.content: The church was a recurrent theme of his life.
auth_sentence.res_content: The church was a recurrent theme of his life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The church was a recurrent theme of his life.

auth_sentence.content: Recurrent or severe chest infections often need hospital treatment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Recurrent or severe chest infections often need hospital treatment.

auth_sentence.content: We can't look after our own recurrent expenditure.

stems_affixes.word_buile: curr跑,发生,快速做……+ent……的→跑的→流动[的]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 正在发生的, 偶然发生的
stems_affixes.word_buile: occurrence[[n.发生,出现,事件,发生的事情]]男→adj.正在发生的, 偶然发生的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一再发生的;复发的,反复出现的
stems_affixes.word_buile: recur[v.[尤指不好的事]一再发生;重现]+ent……的→recurrent一再发生的
concur[v.意见相同,一致,互助]+ent……的→concurrent同时发生的
curr跑,发生,快速做……+ency表名词→流通货币[跑来跑去的钱]
curr跑,发生,快速做……+ent……的→跑的→流动[的]
curr跑,发生,快速做……+iculum表名词→学生跑来跑去的[依据]→课程表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发生,出现,事件,发生的事情
stems_affixes.word_buile: occur[v.发生,出现;存在;想起,想到]+ence表名词→occurrence发生,出现

sentences.en: For much of his life he suffered from recurrent bouts of depression.
sentences.cn: 他的大半辈子反复发作抑郁症。
